mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pw, name, tel, img_name, like_categories, introduce, imgPath) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{img_name}, #{like_categories}, #{introduce}, #{imgPath})
